.class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void FormsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);
type FormsAuthenticationEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormsAuthenticationEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 \*\* 的 \*\*FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 类的 事件定义 委托。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以通过在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**的子程序，来访问 类的 事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 事件期间引发 事件。The event is raised during the event. 使用当前 构造 对象并将其传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 可以使用提供给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件的 对象的 属性，将当前 的 属性设置为自定义 对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件期间为 属性指定值，则使用 COOKIE 或 URL 中的 forms 身份验证票证提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. 仅当身份验证 设置为 并且 是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块时才会引发**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件将当前 的 属性设置为具有自定义 的 对象。The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
